Package controller.state.gamephase.endphase

Class EndPhase

java.lang.Object
controller.state.Phase
controller.state.gamephase.GamePhase
controller.state.gamephase.endphase.EndPhase
public class EndPhase
extends GamePhase
This is the class that inherits GamePhase class whose fucntion is to print the winner of the game
